text: @markknoller @PressSec This opportunist does not have the right to give Coronavirus to somebody else by deliberately not protecting the people around her. Nice that she has the luxury of being tested 'regularly'. However, most people she's influencing have NEVER been tested. Lead by example. Indeed.
